Room.Name: Rosecrest Street/Lelion Way Intersection
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the intersection of Rosecrest Street and Lelion Way.
Room.LongDescription: Lelion Way runs east and west along the shores of the Lithium Inlet and the subsequent river it forms to the east. Rosecrest Street runs north and south across the Lithium Inlet, towards the Lyanden Castle in the north and eventually ends at the southern City Walls in the southwestern corner of town.
